heading: Converts.
general-note: Here are entered general works on persons who have changed their religious affiliation or adopted a new religious affiliation. Works on converts to specific religions are entered under headings of the type. Buddhist converts; Christian converts;. etc. Works emphasizing the religion from which conversion takes place are entered under headings of the type. Muslim converts from Bahai Faith; Muslim converts from Christianity; Christian converts from Hinduism;. etc..
